metadata.titleEn: Glacier coverage data on the Tibetan Plateau in 2017 (TPG2017, Version1.0)
metadata.description: The Tibetan Plateau Glacier Data –TPG2017 is a glacial coverage data on the Tibetan Plateau from selected 210 scenes of Landsat 8 Operational Land Imager (OLI) images with 30-m spatial resolution from 2013 to 2018, among of which 90% was in 2017 and 85% in winter. Therefore, 2017 was defined as the reference year for the mosaic image. Glacier outlines were digitized on-screen manually from the 2017 image mosaic, relying on false-colour image composites (RGB by bands 654), which allowed us to distinguish ice/snow from cloud. Debris-free ice was distinguished from the debris and debris-covered ice by its higher reflectance. Debris-covered ice was not delineated in this data. The delineated glacier outlines were compared with band-ratio (e.g. TM3/TM5) results, and validated by overlapping them onto Google Earth imagery, SRTM DEM, topographic maps and corresponding satellite images. For areas with mountain shadows and snow cover, they were verified by different methods using data from different seasons. For glaciers in deep shadow, Google EarthTM imagery from different dates was used as the reference for manual delineation. Steep slopes or headwalls were also excluded in the TPG2017. Areas that appeared in any of these sources to have the characteristics of exposed ground/basement/bed rock were manually delineated as non-glacier, and were also cross-checked with CGI-1 and CGI-2. Steep hanging glaciers were included in TPG2017 if they were identifiable on images in all other three epochs (i.e. TPG1976, TPG2001, and TPG2013). The accuracy of manual digitization was controlled within one half-pixel. All glacier areas were calculated on the WGS84 spheroid in an Albers equal-area map projection centred at (95°E, 30°N) with standard parallels at 15°N and 65°N. Our results showed that the relative deviation of manual interpretation was less than 3.9%.
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集是2017年青藏高原冰川数据，使用了210景Landsat8 OLI卫星多光谱遥感数据，时间从2013年至2018年，90%来源于2017年,85%的Landsat8 OLI数据成像于冬季。冰川数据是青藏高原净冰川覆盖范围，不包括表碛物覆盖部分。数据格式是TIFF，可以为青藏高原冰川变化、冰川水文研究提供基础数据支持。
数据内容： Value是冰川斑块在系统中自动生成的编码。
格网单元：30m
数据的投影方式：Albers等积圆锥投影。
数据加工方法：基于210景Landsat8 OLI卫星多光谱遥感数据，校正、镶嵌为假彩色合成影像（RGB:654），采用人工目视解译方法，参考波段比值法结果，结合SRTM DEM V4.1数据与Google Earth和HJ1A/1B卫星同一年不同季节的影像，剔除了山体阴影、季节性积雪的影响，参考我国第一期和第二期冰川编目数据，剔除了非冰川区的陡崖、裸露基岩等，综合提取净冰川专题矢量数据，不包括冰川末端位置不清的表碛物覆盖区域，冰川边界数字化精度为半个像元（15m）。通过对比分析，可知基于多数据源、参考多方法结果、综合专家经验知识人-机互动方法提取获得的山地冰川数据更准确。具体数据提取方法详见参考文献：
Ye, Q., J.Zong,L.Tian et al. (2017). Glacier changes on the Tibetan Plateau derived from Landsat imagery: mid-1970s – 2000 – 2013. Journal of Glaciology,63(238), 273-87. DOI:10.1017/jog.2016.137。
原始遥感资料数据精度：30m
数据质量控制措施：冰川边界数字化精度控制在半个像元之内（15m）。
项目来源：中国科学院战略性先导科技专项（A类）（XDA19070302）, 第二次青藏高原综合科学考察研究资助（2019QZKK0202），国家自然科学基金项目（41530748, 91747201）、中国科学院“十三五”信息化建设专项资助(XXH13505-06)。

background: Nearly all mountain glaciers have been melting rapidly in recent decades (Gardner and others, 2013; Zemp and others, 2015) and this has been documented, especially in High Mountain Asia (HMA hereafter), in surveys of the whole (Li and others, 2008; Cogley, 2016) or large parts (Bolch and others, 2012; Yao and others, 2012) of the region as well as in basin-scale and single-glacier studies (Fujita and Nuimura, 2011; Wang and others, 2013; Yang and others, 2013). As reported in these earlier studies, most HMA glaciers showed obvious shrinkage (area loss) and thinning (implying mass loss) except in the west, for example in the Karakoram (Gardelle and others, 2012) and western Kunlun (Neckel and others, 2014; Kääb and others, 2015; Ke and others, 2015). However, due to strong spatiotemporal differences of climate variability and topographic effects, the magnitudes of glacier shrinkage have varied in space and time. The TP, defined by outlines from Zhang and others (2014), can be divided into two categories of hydrological unit, the outlines and basin codes of which we take from Shi and others (2008). Generally, meltwater from glaciers in IB flows into inland depressions, while those in EC flow into the ocean and so contribute more directly to sea-level rise. Climatically, the Indian monsoon dominates in the southeastern TP in summer (e.g. in 5O, 5N, 5L), with some effects from the East Asian monsoon in the east (e.g. in 5Y4, 5J, 5K). The westerlies are dominant in winter, especially in the western TP (e.g. 5Y6, 5Z4, 5Z3). Regions in the interior TP, such as 5Z1, 5Z2, 5Z5, 5Z6 and 5Y5 are less influenced both by the summer monsoon and the westerlies (Yao and others, 2012).
research objective: In this study, we present debris-free glacier area changes and their spatial heterogeneity at the plateau scale from the 1970s to 2013 based on three mosaic Landsat images, i.e. in the 1970s (TPG1970s), TPG2001 and TPG2013. Another purpose of the study is to enrich the available collection of glacier inventories in HMA, by presenting a detailed comparison of TPG datasets with previous glacier inventories.
challenges: We were unable to remove debris-covered areas from the GAMDAM inventory (GGI) (Nuimura and others, 2015), which includes debris cover but does not distinguish it from debris-free ice. Obviously snow and clouds could have affected glacier delineation, especially in southeastern Tibet where cloudy days are rather frequent in every season. Nor is it likely that the area differences are due to different treatment of debris cover, which is omitted in TGP2001 and included in GAMDAM.
methods: Glacier outlines (TPG1976, TPG2001 and TPG2013) were digitized manually with guidance from the SRTM DEM v4.1 and Google Earth imagery. To achieve complete multi-temporal coverage in a reasonable time, only debris-free ice was delineated. Time series of Landsat scenes were processed with Standard Terrain Correction (Level 1T), which provided systematic radiometric and geometric accuracy by incorporating ground control points while employing SRTM DEM for topographic accuracy. High-quality images with minimal cloud and snow coverage were selected for the delineation of glaciers. Glacier outlines were digitized on-screen manually from the three image mosaics, relying on false-colour image composites (MSS: red, green and blue (RGB) represented by bands 321; TM/ETM+: RGB by bands 543, OLI: RGB by bands 654), which allowed us to distinguish ice and snow from cloud. The manual delineation was carried out by three operators over a period of 6 years. The delineated glacier outlines were validated and edited by different operators at least three times by overlaying them onto Google Earth imagery, DEMs, topographic maps and corresponding satellite images by another two glacier researchers with field survey experience.
dataset: Glacier area on the plateau decreased from 44 366 ± 2827 km2 (1.7% of the study area) in the 1970s to 42 210 ± 1621 km2 in 2001 and 41 137 ± 1616 km2 in 2013.
findings: The comparative analysis of three mosaics shows that glacier area loss across the entire Tibetan Plateau is unequivocal. The glaciers in the M1970-76 subset showed shrinkage at−0.19% a−1 during 1976– 2001 and −0.20% a−1 during 2001– 13. Glaciers in the M1970-88 subset shrank at −0.34% a−1 during 1988 – 2013, and in the M1970-94 subset at −0.42% a−1 during 1994– 2013. The most dramatic glacier shrinkage occurred in the Mekong basin (region 5L) in the southeast, with change rates for M1970s-76 glaciers of −0.43% a−1 during 1976 – 2013 (−0.31% a−1 during 1976– 2001 and −0.73% a−1 during 2001– 13). Glaciers in the western and northern Tibetan Plateau changed at the slowest rates: −0.12% a−1 in 5Y6, −0.14% a−1 in 5Z1, −0.17% a−1 in 5Y5 and −0.17% a−1 in 5Z5 from 1976 to 2013. Overall, glaciers in externally drained catchments showed more dramatic shrinkage than those in the internally drained catchments. This shows a spatial gradient across the plateau of glacier shrinkage rate, decreasing from the southeast to the north and the west.
backgroundCn: 近年来，几乎所有的山地冰川都在快速融化（Gardner 等，2013；Zemp 等，2015），这一现象在高山亚洲（以下简称 HMA）得到了特别的记录，包括对整个地区（Li 等，2008；Cogley，2016）或大部分地区（Bolch 等，2012；Yao 等，2012）的调查，以及流域规模和单个冰川的研究（Fujita 和 Nuimura，2011；Wang 等，2013；Yang 等，2013）。正如这些早期研究所报告的，大多数 HMA 冰川显示出明显的缩小（面积损失）和变薄（意味着质量损失），但在西部地区，例如喀喇昆仑（Gardelle 等，2012）和西昆仑（Neckel 等，2014；Kääb 等，2015；Ke 等，2015）则有所不同。然而，由于气候变异和地形效应的强烈时空差异，冰川缩小的幅度在空间和时间上有所不同。青藏高原（TP）根据 Zhang 等（2014）的轮廓可以分为两类水文单元，其轮廓和流域代码取自 Shi 等（2008）。一般来说，来自内陆冰川的融水流入内陆洼地，而来自东部冰川的融水则流入海洋，因此更直接地对海平面上升产生影响。在气候上，印度季风在东南 TP 的夏季占主导地位（例如在 5O、5N、5L），而东亚季风在东部也有一些影响（例如在 5Y4、5J、5K）。西风在冬季占主导地位，尤其是在西部 TP（例如 5Y6、5Z4、5Z3）。青藏高原内部的地区，如 5Z1、5Z2、5Z5、5Z6 和 5Y5，受到夏季季风和西风的影响较小（Yao 等，2012）。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们基于三幅马赛克的Landsat影像（即1970年代的TPG1970s、TPG2001和TPG2013），展示了1970年代至2013年间无碎屑冰川面积变化及其在高原尺度上的空间异质性。研究的另一个目的是通过对TPG数据集与之前的冰川清单进行详细比较，丰富喜马拉雅地区现有的冰川清单。
challengesCn: 我们无法从GAMDAM库存（GGI）中去除覆盖碎屑的区域（Nuimura等，2015），该库存包括碎屑覆盖但未将其与无碎屑冰区区分开来。显然，雪和云层可能影响冰川的划界，特别是在西南藏区，那里在每个季节多云的日子相对频繁。此外，区域差异不太可能是由于对碎屑覆盖的不同处理造成的，因为TGP2001中省略了碎屑覆盖，而GAMDAM中则包含了碎屑覆盖。
methodsCn: 冰川轮廓（TPG1976、TPG2001 和 TPG2013）是通过手动数字化的，参考了 SRTM DEM v4.1 和 Google Earth 图像。为了在合理的时间内实现完整的多时相覆盖，仅对无碎石的冰体进行了划定。对 Landsat 场景的时间序列进行了标准地形校正（Level 1T）处理，这通过结合地面控制点并使用 SRTM DEM 提供了系统的辐射和几何精度，以确保地形精度。选择了高质量、云和雪覆盖最少的图像用于冰川的划定。冰川轮廓是通过手动在三个图像马赛克上进行数字化的，依赖于假彩色图像合成（MSS：红、绿和蓝（RGB）由波段 321 表示；TM/ETM+：RGB 由波段 543 表示；OLI：RGB 由波段 654 表示），这使我们能够区分冰和雪与云。手动划定工作由三名操作员在六年内进行。划定的冰川轮廓经过不同操作员至少三次验证和编辑，方法是将其叠加到 Google Earth 图像、DEM、地形图和相应的卫星图像上，由另外两名具有实地调查经验的冰川研究人员进行审核。
datasetCn: 高原上的冰川面积从1970年代的44,366 ± 2,827平方公里（占研究区域的1.7%）减少到2001年的42,210 ± 1,621平方公里，以及2013年的41,137 ± 1,616平方公里。
findingsCn: 三幅马赛克的比较分析表明，整个青藏 Plateau的冰川面积损失是无可否认的。在M1970-76子集中的冰川在1976年至2001年期间的收缩率为−0.19% a−1，在2001年至2013年期间为−0.20% a−1。M1970-88子集中的冰川在1988年至2013年期间的收缩率为−0.34% a−1，而在M1970-94子集中的冰川在1994年至2013年期间的收缩率为−0.42% a−1。最显著的冰川收缩发生在东南部的湄公河流域（5L区域），M1970s-76冰川在1976年至2013年期间的变化率为−0.43% a−1（1976年至2001年期间为−0.31% a−1，2001年至2013年期间为−0.73% a−1）。青藏 Plateau西部和北部的冰川变化速率最慢：在5Y6区域为−0.12% a−1，在5Z1区域为−0.14% a−1，在5Y5区域为−0.17% a−1，在5Z5区域为−0.17% a−1，时间范围为1976年至2013年。总体而言，外部排水流域的冰川收缩比内部排水流域的冰川更为显著。这显示出冰川收缩速率在青藏 Plateau上存在空间梯度，从东南部向北部和西部递减。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is manual digitization used in the process of delineating glacier outlines in the relevant datasets?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在相关数据集中，手动数字化是否用于划定冰川轮廓的过程？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are challenges such as snow and clouds affecting glacier delineation addressed in the data collection methods for the Tibetan Plateau glacier datasets?
Verification.QuestionCn: 诸如雪和云等挑战是否在青藏高原冰川数据集的数据收集方法中得到解决？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which data processing method is more effective for glacier boundary extraction, manual digitization or automated algorithms?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪种数据处理方法在冰川边界提取中更有效，手动数字化还是自动算法？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the primary challenge in glacier data collection related to cloud cover, seasonal snow, or debris cover?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 冰川数据收集的主要挑战与云层覆盖、季节性雪或碎石覆盖有关吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are datasets of glacier change mainly derived from Landsat imagery, SRTM DEM, or Google Earth imagery?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 冰川变化的数据集主要来源于Landsat影像、SRTM数字高程模型（DEM）或谷歌地球影像吗？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where do challenges arise in distinguishing debris-free glacier areas during data collection?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在数据收集过程中，区分无碎片冰川区域时会出现哪些挑战？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Who benefits from datasets that provide detailed glacier changes on the Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 谁从提供关于青藏 Plateau 冰川变化的详细数据集中受益？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that addresses the challenge of distinguishing between debris-covered and debris-free glacier areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，以解决区分覆盖碎石和无碎石冰川区域的挑战？
Example.AnswerEn: One example of a data collection method addressing this challenge involves the use of manual digitization of glacier outlines with guidance from SRTM DEM and Google Earth imagery, where only debris-free ice was delineated. This approach helped to achieve complete multi-temporal coverage in a reasonable time.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种应对这一挑战的数据收集方法涉及使用SRTM数字高程模型和谷歌地球影像的指导，手动数字化冰川轮廓，仅划定无碎石的冰面。这种方法有助于在合理的时间内实现完整的多时相覆盖。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge in data collection when using satellite imagery for glacier monitoring in regions with frequent cloud cover?
Example.QuestionCn: 在云层频繁的地区使用卫星影像进行冰川监测时，数据收集面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in data collection using satellite imagery for glacier monitoring in cloudy regions, such as southeastern Tibet, includes the difficulty in delineating glaciers due to snow and cloud coverage, which affects the accuracy of glacier outlines.
Example.AnswerCn: 在像西南藏这样的多云地区，使用卫星影像进行冰川监测的数据收集面临的一个挑战是，由于雪和云层覆盖，难以清晰划定冰川的边界，这影响了冰川轮廓的准确性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that illustrates the spatial heterogeneity of glacier changes across the Tibetan Plateau over several decades?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个示例数据集，说明青藏高原在几十年间冰川变化的空间异质性？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is the glacier area dataset that shows a decrease from 44,366 ± 2,827 km2 in the 1970s to 42,210 ± 1,621 km2 in 2001 and 41,137 ± 1,616 km2 in 2013, illustrating the spatial heterogeneity of glacier changes across the Tibetan Plateau.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子是冰川面积数据集，显示出从1970年代的44,366 ± 2,827平方公里减少到2001年的42,210 ± 1,621平方公里，以及2013年的41,137 ± 1,616平方公里，说明了青藏高原冰川变化的空间异质性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of glacier data derived from multi-spectral remote sensing?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 多光谱遥感获取的冰川数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: net glacier coverage areas without debris, TIFF format, 30m grid unit, Albers equal-area conic projection, false-color composite images (RGB:654), manually digitized glacier outlines, boundary digitization precision of half a pixel (15m)
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 无覆盖物的净冰川覆盖面积，TIFF格式，30米网格单位，阿尔伯斯等面积圆锥投影，假彩色合成图像（RGB:654），手动数字化冰川轮廓，边界数字化精度为半个像素（15米）。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What challenges are faced when delineating glacier boundaries using remote sensing data?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用遥感数据划定冰川边界时面临的挑战有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: distinguishing debris-covered areas, removing seasonal snow and shadows, dealing with cloud coverage, manual digitization, validation by multiple operators using various reference data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 区分覆盖碎屑的区域，去除季节性积雪和阴影，处理云层覆盖，手动数字化，使用各种参考数据由多名操作员进行验证。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes of glaciers can be measured and analyzed to assess their changes over time?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 可以测量和分析哪些冰川的属性来评估它们随时间的变化？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: glacier area changes, spatial heterogeneity of glacier shrinkage, rate of glacier area loss over different time periods
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 冰川面积变化、冰川缩减的空间异质性、不同时间段的冰川面积损失率

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the grid cell size used in the glacier dataset for the Tibetan Plateau?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 青藏 Plateau 冰川数据集使用的网格单元大小是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'manual digitization of glacier outlines' entail in remote sensing data processing?
Definition.QuestionCn: “冰川轮廓的手动数字化”在遥感数据处理中的含义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Manual digitization of glacier outlines involves manually tracing the boundaries of glaciers on satellite imagery. This process is typically guided by auxiliary datasets such as digital elevation models (DEMs) and involves human operators who use tools to create vector representations of glacier extents. It is a precise method that allows researchers to differentiate ice and snow from other features like clouds.
Definition.AnswerCn: 手动数字化冰川轮廓涉及在卫星影像上手动描绘冰川的边界。这个过程通常借助辅助数据集，如数字高程模型（DEM），并且需要人工操作员使用工具来创建冰川范围的矢量表示。这是一种精确的方法，允许研究人员区分冰雪与云等其他特征。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do manual digitization methods using Landsat imagery compare to automated systems in terms of accuracy and applicability for glacier delineation on the Tibetan Plateau?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 手动数字化方法与自动化系统在准确性和适用性方面如何比较，以用于青藏高原的冰川划界？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Manual digitization methods allow for high accuracy, as demonstrated by the digitization precision of half a pixel (15m), and involve expert validation across multiple datasets such as SRTM DEM and Google Earth. This method also allows for nuanced exclusion of non-glacier areas like debris-covered regions. Automated systems may lack this level of precision and contextual understanding but could potentially process data faster.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 手动数字化方法允许高精度，如半个像素（15米）的数字化精度，并涉及对多个数据集（如SRTM DEM和谷歌地球）的专家验证。这种方法还允许对非冰川区域（如覆盖碎石的区域）进行细致的排除。自动化系统可能缺乏这种精度和上下文理解，但可能能够更快地处理数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the exclusion of debris-covered ice in glacier inventories affect the reported glacier area changes when using datasets like TPG compared to inventories that include debris cover?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在冰川清单中排除覆盖碎石的冰川会如何影响使用像TPG这样的数据集报告的冰川面积变化，与包括碎石覆盖的清单相比？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Excluding debris-covered ice, as done in the TPG datasets, results in a more accurate representation of net glacier area changes by focusing on debris-free ice. Inventories that include debris cover may report larger glacier areas but can introduce inaccuracies due to the difficulty in distinguishing debris-covered ice from surrounding terrain and other land features.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 排除覆盖碎屑的冰层，如TPG数据集中所做的，可以更准确地反映冰川净面积变化，因为它专注于无碎屑的冰。包含碎屑覆盖的清单可能会报告更大的冰川面积，但由于难以区分覆盖碎屑的冰与周围地形和其他地面特征，可能会引入不准确性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the integration of multiple remote sensing data sources and interpretation techniques improve the accuracy of glacier mapping on the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多种遥感数据源和解译技术的整合如何提高对青藏高原冰川制图的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of multiple remote sensing data sources, such as Landsat images, SRTM DEM, and Google Earth, along with various interpretation techniques like false-color composites and manual digitization, allows for more accurate glacier mapping by accounting for factors like mountain shadows and seasonal snow. This comprehensive approach helps refine glacier boundaries and ensures higher precision in data extraction, as evidenced by the half-pixel accuracy control (15m) achieved in the dataset.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多种遥感数据源的整合，如Landsat影像、SRTM数字高程模型和谷歌地球，以及各种解译技术，如假彩色合成和手动数字化，使得冰川制图更加准确，能够考虑到山影和季节性雪等因素。这种综合方法有助于细化冰川边界，并确保数据提取的更高精度，正如数据集中实现的半像素精度控制（15米）所证明的那样。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges are faced in distinguishing between debris-covered and debris-free glacier areas, and how might these affect the interpretation of glacier change data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在区分有碎石覆盖和无碎石覆盖的冰川区域时面临哪些挑战，这些挑战可能如何影响冰川变化数据的解读？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in distinguishing debris-covered from debris-free glacier areas include the inability to remove debris-covered areas from certain inventories and the potential for snow and cloud coverage to obscure glacier delineation. These challenges can lead to discrepancies in glacier change data interpretation, as debris-covered areas might be misclassified or omitted, affecting the accuracy of area change assessments over time.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 区分覆盖碎石的冰川区域和无碎石的冰川区域面临的挑战包括无法从某些清单中去除覆盖碎石的区域，以及雪和云层覆盖可能遮挡冰川轮廓。这些挑战可能导致冰川变化数据解释中的差异，因为覆盖碎石的区域可能被错误分类或遗漏，从而影响随时间推移的面积变化评估的准确性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways could the temporal and spatial variability of climatic influences on the Tibetan Plateau impact glacier change data collected from remote sensing sources?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 气候影响在时间和空间上的变化如何影响从遥感来源收集的青藏高原冰川变化数据？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The temporal and spatial variability of climatic influences, such as the Indian monsoon in the southeast and westerlies in the west, can significantly impact glacier change data by causing variations in melt rates and seasonal snow coverage. These climatic factors contribute to the heterogeneous patterns of glacier shrinkage observed across the plateau, necessitating careful interpretation and potentially requiring adjustments in data collection and analysis methods to account for these environmental variables.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 气候影响的时间和空间变异性，例如东南部的印度季风和西部的西风，可能会显著影响冰川变化数据，导致融化率和季节性雪覆盖的变化。这些气候因素导致了高原上冰川缩减的异质性模式，因此需要谨慎解读，并可能需要在数据收集和分析方法上进行调整，以考虑这些环境变量。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges of accurately delineating glacier boundaries in high-altitude regions using satellite imagery?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在高海拔地区使用卫星影像准确划定冰川边界的挑战因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Factors contributing to the challenges include the presence of snow and cloud cover, which can obscure glacier outlines, and the difficulty in distinguishing debris-covered ice from debris-free ice in satellite imagery. Additionally, spatiotemporal differences in climate variability and topographic effects can affect the accuracy of glacier delineation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 导致挑战的因素包括雪和云层的存在，这可能会遮挡冰川轮廓，以及在卫星图像中区分覆盖碎石的冰和无碎石的冰的困难。此外，气候变异的时空差异和地形效应也会影响冰川划界的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes variations in glacier shrinkage rates across different regions of the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致青藏高原不同地区冰川缩减速率差异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Variations in glacier shrinkage rates are caused by differing climatic influences across the plateau, such as the dominance of the Indian monsoon in the southeastern regions and the influence of the westerlies in the western areas. Additionally, the spatial gradient of glacier shrinkage rates, decreasing from the southeast to the north and west, reflects the interplay of these climatic factors with topographic features and hydrological units that either contribute meltwater to inland depressions or the ocean.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 冰川缩小速率的变化是由于高原地区气候影响的差异所致，例如东南地区印度季风的主导作用和西部地区西风的影响。此外，冰川缩小速率的空间梯度从东南向北和西部递减，反映了这些气候因素与地形特征和水文单元之间的相互作用，这些因素要么向内陆洼地提供融水，要么向海洋输送融水。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the results of excluding debris-covered areas from glacier datasets, and what implications does this have on the understanding of glacier dynamics?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 排除覆盖碎屑的区域对冰川数据集的结果是什么，这对理解冰川动态有什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Excluding debris-covered areas from glacier datasets results in a more accurate representation of debris-free glacier changes. This omission, however, can lead to underestimation of total glacier mass loss and area change, which impacts the understanding of glacier dynamics, especially in regions where debris cover is significant.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 排除冰川数据集中的覆盖碎屑区域可以更准确地反映无碎屑冰川的变化。然而，这种省略可能导致对总冰川质量损失和面积变化的低估，这影响了对冰川动态的理解，尤其是在碎屑覆盖显著的地区。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary goals of using Landsat satellite imagery and DEMs in collecting glacier data on the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用Landsat卫星影像和数字高程模型（DEMs）收集青藏高原冰川数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal is to accurately delineate debris-free glacier areas and understand their spatial heterogeneity over time. This approach is intended to provide a comprehensive inventory of glacier changes and enrich existing datasets with detailed comparisons, contributing to research on glacier shrinkage and water resource implications.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是准确划定无碎屑的冰川区域，并了解其随时间变化的空间异质性。这种方法旨在提供冰川变化的全面清单，并通过详细比较丰富现有数据集，为冰川缩减和水资源影响的研究做出贡献。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives of controlling data quality measures to within half a pixel in glacier boundary digitization?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在冰川边界数字化过程中，将数据质量控制在半个像素以内的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to enhance the accuracy of glacier boundary data to a spatial resolution of 15 meters, which is critical for detecting subtle changes in glacier areas over time. This level of precision supports better assessments of glacier shrinkage rates and informs hydrological and climate change research.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是将冰川边界数据的精度提高到15米的空间分辨率，这对于检测冰川面积随时间的微小变化至关重要。这一精度水平支持对冰川缩减率的更好评估，并为水文和气候变化研究提供信息。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are employed to ensure the accuracy of glacier boundary digitization in remote sensing datasets?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据集中，确保冰川边界数字化准确性的方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The glacier boundaries are digitized manually with guidance from SRTM DEM v4.1 and Google Earth imagery. The process involves manual delineation on-screen from false-color image composites, followed by validation and editing by different operators overlaying them onto Google Earth imagery, DEMs, topographic maps, and corresponding satellite images. The boundary accuracy is controlled within half a pixel (15m).
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 冰川边界是通过参考SRTM DEM v4.1和谷歌地球影像手动数字化的。该过程涉及从假彩色图像合成中进行手动划定，随后由不同的操作员在谷歌地球影像、数字高程模型（DEM）、地形图和相应的卫星图像上进行验证和编辑。边界精度控制在半个像素（15米）以内。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are taken to integrate multiple data sources and methods for comprehensive glacier data extraction?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 整合多个数据源和方法以全面提取冰川数据需要采取哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data extraction process involves using Landsat8 OLI satellite multispectral remote sensing data corrected and mosaicked into false-color composite images. The process references band ratio method results, SRTM DEM V4.1 data, Google Earth, and HJ1A/1B satellite images from different seasons. Non-glacier areas are excluded by comparing with previous glacier inventories and expert knowledge.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据提取过程涉及使用经过校正和镶嵌的Landsat8 OLI卫星多光谱遥感数据，生成假彩色合成图像。该过程参考了波段比率方法的结果、SRTM DEM V4.1数据、谷歌地球以及不同季节的HJ1A/1B卫星图像。通过与先前的冰川清单和专家知识进行比较，排除了非冰川区域。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data processing techniques enable the extraction of accurate glacier boundaries from multispectral remote sensing imagery?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据处理技术能够从多光谱遥感影像中提取准确的冰川边界？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Based on the field information, data processing techniques such as geometric and radiometric correction of Landsat8 OLI multispectral data, and the creation of false-color composite images (RGB:654), enable the extraction of accurate glacier boundaries. These techniques, combined with manual visual interpretation, SRTM DEM data, and cross-referencing with Google Earth and additional satellite imagery, help exclude non-glacier areas like mountain shadows and seasonal snow.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 基于领域信息，数据处理技术如Landsat8 OLI多光谱数据的几何和辐射校正，以及创建假彩色合成图像（RGB:654），能够提取准确的冰川边界。这些技术结合手动视觉解译、SRTM DEM数据，以及与谷歌地球和其他卫星影像的交叉参考，有助于排除非冰川区域，如山影和季节性雪。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches enable researchers to control data quality during glacier boundary digitization?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论方法能够帮助研究人员在冰川边界数字化过程中控制数据质量？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Methodological approaches that enable data quality control include manual digitization with repeated validation and editing by multiple operators, ensuring glacier boundary precision within half a pixel (15m). This process involves overlaying digitized outlines onto several reference sources, such as Google Earth imagery and topographic maps, to verify accuracy.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据质量控制的方法论包括手动数字化，并由多个操作员进行重复验证和编辑，以确保冰川边界的精度在半个像素（15米）以内。该过程涉及将数字化轮廓叠加到多个参考源上，例如谷歌地球影像和地形图，以验证准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected challenges when using satellite imagery for glacier inventory in regions with high cloud cover, and how might these be addressed?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在高云覆盖地区使用卫星影像进行冰川清单编制时，预期会面临哪些挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Expected challenges include difficulty in distinguishing glaciers from clouds, which might be addressed by selecting high-quality images with minimal cloud coverage and employing techniques like false-color composites to enhance ice and snow differentiation, as indicated by the methods utilizing different band combinations for image analysis.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 预期的挑战包括难以区分冰川和云，这可以通过选择云层覆盖较少的高质量图像以及采用假彩色合成技术来增强冰雪的区分度来解决，正如利用不同波段组合进行图像分析的方法所示。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your opinion on the effectiveness of using multispectral remote sensing data for glacier area delineation on the Tibetan Plateau?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对使用多光谱遥感数据在青藏高原进行冰川区域划定的有效性有何看法？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of multispectral remote sensing data, such as Landsat8 OLI, is effective for glacier area delineation on the Tibetan Plateau. It enables the creation of false-color composite images that aid in distinguishing ice and snow from clouds. However, the process requires careful manual digitization to ensure accuracy, especially in complex terrain where debris cover and seasonal snow may affect results.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多光谱遥感数据的使用，例如Landsat8 OLI，对于青藏高原的冰川面积划定是有效的。它能够创建假彩色合成图像，帮助区分冰雪与云层。然而，这一过程需要仔细的手动数字化，以确保准确性，特别是在复杂地形中，碎石覆盖和季节性雪可能会影响结果。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the challenges in achieving accurate glacier data extraction in regions with frequent cloud cover and snow, such as southeastern Tibet?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在云层和积雪频繁的地区（如西藏东南部）实现准确的冰川数据提取的挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Achieving accurate glacier data extraction in regions with frequent cloud cover and snow, like southeastern Tibet, is quite challenging. The presence of clouds and snow can obscure glacier outlines, making it difficult to ensure precise delineation. Selecting high-quality images with minimal cloud and snow coverage and using techniques like manual digitization and validation against multiple data sources are crucial to overcoming these challenges.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在云层和雪覆盖频繁的地区，如西南藏，获取准确的冰川数据提取非常具有挑战性。云和雪的存在会遮挡冰川轮廓，使得确保精确划定变得困难。选择高质量的图像，尽量减少云和雪的覆盖，以及使用手动数字化和与多个数据源进行验证等技术，对于克服这些挑战至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your judgment, what are the potential benefits and limitations of integrating multiple datasets, such as SRTM DEM and Google Earth imagery, for enhancing glacier boundary accuracy?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，整合多个数据集（如SRTM数字高程模型和谷歌地球影像）以提高冰川边界准确性的潜在好处和局限性是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating multiple datasets like SRTM DEM and Google Earth imagery can significantly enhance glacier boundary accuracy by providing additional topographic and visual context. This integration allows for cross-validation and error checking, improving the reliability of the delineation. However, it may also introduce complexity and require considerable expertise to effectively manage and interpret the different data sources.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合多个数据集，如SRTM数字高程模型（DEM）和谷歌地球影像，可以显著提高冰川边界的准确性，因为它提供了额外的地形和视觉背景。这种整合允许进行交叉验证和错误检查，从而提高划界的可靠性。然而，这也可能引入复杂性，并需要相当的专业知识来有效管理和解释不同的数据源。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I am unsure how the manual digitization of glacier outlines can ensure accuracy across different operators and time periods.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定手动数字化冰川轮廓如何能确保不同操作员和时间段之间的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The manual delineation was carried out by three operators over a period of 6 years. The delineated glacier outlines were validated and edited by different operators at least three times by overlaying them onto Google Earth imagery, DEMs, topographic maps, and corresponding satellite images by another two glacier researchers with field survey experience.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 手动划定工作由三名操作员在六年内进行。划定的冰川轮廓经过不同操作员至少三次的验证和编辑，方法是将其叠加到谷歌地球影像、数字高程模型（DEM）、地形图和相应的卫星图像上，由另外两名具有实地调查经验的冰川研究人员进行审核。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the data processing methods used in collecting glacier data from satellite imagery in high-altitude regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结在高海拔地区从卫星影像收集冰川数据所使用的数据处理方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data processing methods for collecting glacier data involve using Landsat8 OLI satellite multispectral remote sensing data, correcting and mosaicking to create false-color composite images (RGB:654). Manual visual interpretation, supported by the band ratio method results, is employed. This process includes referencing SRTM DEM V4.1 data and images from Google Earth and HJ1A/1B satellites from different seasons of the same year to mitigate shadow and seasonal snow effects. Non-glacier areas such as steep cliffs and bare bedrock are excluded, and glacier boundaries are digitized with a precision of half a pixel (15m). This multi-source, multi-method, expert-interactive approach results in more accurate mountain glacier data extraction.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 收集冰川数据的数据处理方法包括使用Landsat8 OLI卫星多光谱遥感数据，进行校正和拼接以创建假彩色复合图像（RGB:654）。采用手动视觉解译，辅以波段比率法的结果。该过程包括参考SRTM DEM V4.1数据以及来自Google Earth和HJ1A/1B卫星的不同季节的图像，以减轻阴影和季节性雪的影响。非冰川区域如陡峭的悬崖和裸露的基岩被排除在外，冰川边界以半个像素（15米）的精度进行数字化。这种多源、多方法、专家互动的方法使得山地冰川数据提取更加准确。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced in removing debris-covered areas in glacier inventories and suggest potential solutions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在冰川清单中去除覆盖碎屑区域所面临的挑战，并提出潜在解决方案。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A significant challenge in removing debris-covered areas in glacier inventories is the inability to distinguish debris cover from debris-free ice, as observed in the GAMDAM inventory. Snow and clouds also affect glacier delineation, particularly in regions with frequent cloud cover, such as southeastern Tibet. A potential solution could involve using higher resolution imagery or multispectral data to improve differentiation between ice and debris. Additionally, integrating various temporal satellite images and employing advanced image processing techniques, like machine learning, could enhance the accuracy of identifying debris-covered glaciers.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在冰川清单中，去除覆盖碎石的区域面临一个重大挑战，即无法区分覆盖碎石的冰与无碎石的冰，这在GAMDAM清单中得到了体现。雪和云层也会影响冰川的划定，特别是在云层频繁的地区，如西南藏区。一个潜在的解决方案是使用更高分辨率的影像或多光谱数据，以改善冰与碎石之间的区分。此外，整合各种时间的卫星图像并采用先进的图像处理技术，如机器学习，可能会提高识别覆盖碎石冰川的准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please propose methods to improve the accuracy of glacier delineation in satellite imagery, considering the challenges of cloud cover and seasonal snow.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提出改善卫星影像中冰川划界准确性的方法，考虑到云层覆盖和季节性雪的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: To improve the accuracy of glacier delineation in satellite imagery, methods could include using a combination of high-resolution images from different seasons to reduce cloud cover and seasonal snow interference. Advanced image processing techniques, such as machine learning algorithms designed for pattern recognition, can further aid in distinguishing glaciers from clouds and snow. Incorporating ground control points and topographical data from sources like SRTM DEM can enhance geometric accuracy. Additionally, employing a collaborative approach where multiple operators validate and edit delineated outlines can ensure higher precision and reliability in the final glacier data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 为了提高卫星影像中冰川划界的准确性，可以采用多种方法，包括使用来自不同季节的高分辨率图像，以减少云层覆盖和季节性雪的干扰。先进的图像处理技术，如专为模式识别设计的机器学习算法，可以进一步帮助区分冰川、云层和雪。此外，结合来自SRTM DEM等来源的地面控制点和地形数据，可以增强几何精度。此外，采用多操作员协作的方法，对划定的轮廓进行验证和编辑，可以确保最终冰川数据的更高精度和可靠性。
